oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Leon McAuliffe and his Western Swing Band (KCMO) - 1949-12-13
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: KCMO, Kansas City, MO radio program of Leon McAuliffe and his Western Swing Band, including Jimmy Hall (fiddle, vocals) and Morris Billington (piano). Originally broadcast 1949-12-13 (however, according to writing on the disc, this disc was cut in January). Hosted by Johnny Ryan.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Leon McAuliffe; Western Swing Band (Leon McAuliffe)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening theme (Steel Guitar Rag) -- Opening statement (Johnny Ryan, Leon McAuliffe) -- Prosperity Special (Jimmy Hall fiddle, Leon McAuliffe and his Western Swing Band) -- Johnny Ryan and Leon McAuliffe talk -- The Echo Of Your Footsteps (Jimmy Hall vocals, Leon McAuliffe and his Western Swing Band) -- Johnny Ryan and Leon McAuliffe talk -- Sunday Down In Tennessee (Leon McAuliffe and his Western Swing Band) -- Johnny Ryan and Leon McAuliffe talk -- White Christmas (Leon McAuliffe and his Western Swing Band) -- Johnny Ryan and Leon McAuliffe introduce Morris Billington -- Take The "A" Train (Leon McAuliffe and his Western Swing Band) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Johnny Ryan)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: KCMO (Radio station : Kansas City, Mo.); McAuliffe, Leon, 1917-1988; Western Swing Band (Musical group : Leon McAuliffe); Ryan, Johnny (Announcer); Hall, Jimmy, 1921-; Billington, Morris
